com.example.mooderation.backend

Class FollowRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mooderation.backend.FollowRepository

  • public class FollowRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Database abstraction for accessing a participants followers and follow requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FollowRepository()
      Default constructor for the FollowRepository.
      FollowRepository(FirebaseUser user, FirebaseFirestore firestore)
      Constructor for FollowRepository used for testing.

        firestore - A instance of FirebaseFirestore.

      • acceptAs

        public <any> acceptAs(java.lang.String uid,
                      FollowRequest request)
        Accepts a follow request as another user. This is intended to be used for testing.
        Parameters:
        uid - UID of the user accepting the follow request.
        request - Request sent to the user.
        Returns:
        A task which completes once the request has been accepted.

      • deny

        public <any> deny(FollowRequest request)
        Denies a follow request from another user.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Database operation Task.

        Returns:
        LiveData tracking the boolean condition.
